cyclone.name: DORIAN
cyclone.current_location: about 10 miles WSW of Cape Hatteras, North Carolina
cyclone.trajectory: accelerating northeastward off the Mid-Atlantic coast, then toward Nova Scotia
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: outer banks of North Carolina near Cape Hatteras

weather_observation.watch_coast: Hurricane Watch for Nova Scotia; Tropical Storm Watch for Prince Edward Island, Magdalen Islands, parts of New Brunswick and Newfoundland
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane Warning Surf City NC to NC/VA border; Tropical Storm Warning NC/VA border to Fenwick Island DE, portions of Chesapeake Bay, tidal Potomac, and SE Massachusetts islands
weather_observation.impacted_coast: North Carolina, Virginia, Delmarva Peninsula, offshore New Jersey, southeastern New England, Nova Scotia
weather_observation.wind: Low chance (≤4%) of sustained 34-kt winds; breezy conditions with occasional gusts 25–35 mph Saturday morning.
weather_observation.storm_surge: None expected for Delaware River terminals; only minor tidal anomalies possible along New Jersey Atlantic coast.
weather_observation.rainfall: Light to moderate showers, most areas <1 inch.
weather_observation.other_hazards: Dangerous rip currents along the New Jersey shore may affect maritime approaches.
